name: Ini Bukan Rumah Tangga Tok Ngah
description:
'Ini Bukan Rumah Tangga Tok Ngah' is an installation examining the idea of memory and the nature of erasure in the contemporary urban condition. 

Modeled after the stone staircases most famously found in traditional Malay Melaka houses, this 'copy' imitates and manipulates the distinct element of the Malay house.

In an era where old crafts are dyin and new ones rapidly emerging, we are left to reflect on how we are able to bring our past with us into an uncertain future.

Proceeds will be donated to MERCY Malaysia Flood Relief to aid with the December 2021 flood disaster victims in Malaysia.
